Name: Rock, Paper, Scissors Simulator
About the game: Rock, Paper, Scissors Simulator is everyone's childhood nostalgic game now in first person perspective. The game features nice graphics, full body animations and immersive dialogues. While playing, you and your opponent maintain dialogues inspired by various TV-series. This game is not just a Rock, Paper, Scissors simulator, but about simulating being an urchin, hanging out with your friend on a treehouse, treating your nostalgia. Buy this game to have this unique and so familiar game in your library. Features: First ever 3d first person view RPS simulation. Dialogues with face animations Immerse yourself into good old times Great atmosphere Experience being on a treehouse in a Canadian suburb
